quote: Wake up an hour before fagri, remember to seek Allah forgiveness after each solat. Allah is the forgiver of all sin. May he shower his mercy on us and heal the world from COVID-19
author: Ahmad Ibn Yahya

quote: Not everyone says to you "For Allah's sake give me alms", be humble enough to notice your hungry neighbours. May Allah bless us with the favour that comes with this sacred month
author: Khaleel Rahman

quote: Make it a point to quit your bad habits for good in Ramadan. Don't just put them on hold and think of going back to your old self later on.
author: Shakiroh
